steps.name: Given I am on the Login Page of the Gym Management Application
And I enter email and password
Given I click on the Edit account Profile button
Then I should navigate to the update profile page
And I click on Save changes button
Then I should see "Name is required and must contain at least one alphabetic character and cannot be purely numeric." in the "toast"
